name: Aniket Vyas
about: Currently working at Morgan Stanley Advantage Services in it's risk analytics team. Skilled in Python, R programming. Strong professional graduated from Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur (Class of 2018) .

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: â€¢ Derived insights on performance of loan companies across India by analysing trends in assets and liabilities, and compared it with the performance of non-banking financial companies in general.â€¢Studied the borrowing structure of loan companies during past two fiscal years and predicted the borrowing structure for the next year.â€¢Identified Loan Companies who were not conforming to the rules established under the RBI Act, 1934 for NBFCs.â€¢Implemented scripts in R-language to extract and accumulate relevant data and used them extensively for the above analysis, thereby greatly reducing effort.
experience.description_html: â€¢ Derived insights on performance of loan companies across India by analysing trends in assets and liabilities, and compared it with the performance of non-banking financial companies in general.â€¢Studied the borrowing structure of loan companies during past two fiscal years and predicted the borrowing structure for the next year.â€¢Identified Loan Companies who were not conforming to the rules established under the RBI Act, 1934 for NBFCs.â€¢Implemented scripts in R-language to extract and accumulate relevant data and used them extensively for the above analysis, thereby greatly reducing effort.
